div.p:
Curia Balliuorum burgi de Aberdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem Nono die
mensis Junij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono et cetera

The said day Johnne Brabner witht Williame fraser of phillorth knycht his
forspekar solempnitly protestit for his Costis skaithis dampnage and' expens'
maid ande sustenit be him anent the persecucionis of the lande of wmquhile
slewgy throw Inquietacioune of him be Williame lindesay ande agnes scherar
his spous'

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimotercio die mensis
Junij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo Nono

The said day Alexander hay lauchfully Callit be Normunde leslie officiar to haif
Comperit to follow Robert Thomsone for ane bol of meile as day assignit to him
Comperit nocht Nochtwithstanding the said robert present for the tyme offerit
him reddy to ansuer to the said Alexander anent the said bol of meile or ony
vthir thing that he haid to say til him Protestand' for Costis skathis dampnage
ande expens' And' that he be quyt of al challance of the said Alexander one to the
tyme that he be new persewit

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
quinto die mensis Junij Anno dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo Nono

The said day Copin meman skipper of Johnne buris schip callit the pillican
offerit him reddy be the faitht of his bodie his handis vphaldin to fulfill ale
condicionis and poyntis that the said Johnne bur' promittit to the merchandis

Eodem Katherina fecit constituit creauit et nominauit georgium bisset
suum sponsum suum verum legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem Irreuocabilem
ad prosequendum terras et annuos redditus sibi Jure hereditario contingenti
racione decessus quondam thome prat patris suj Et in omnibus aliis actionibus
et causis ipsam Katherinam concernens Promittens se Ratum gratum et cetera

The said day Johnne nicholsone grantit him awand' to Androw cullan
fyve scoir cartill of ploddis to be pait betuix this and the fest of the assumption'
of our lady nixt hereftir

Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de Abirdene xvto die menis Junij Anno Domini millesimo
quingentesimo nono Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyeis preposito Thoma waus Duncano
Colisone et thoma Wode tribus ballivis dicti burgj in pretorio eiusdem protribunali
sedenti per subscriptos videlicet Andream Cullane Johannem Colisone Thomam chawmer Jaco
bum Colisone patricium leslie Willelmum portar Andream fif Dauid mar matheum branche
Willelmum Wormet Johannem Kintor Duncanum fif richardum Waus Alexandrum malisone
et Andream lousone burgensem dicti burgj Quj Jurati dicunt quod Alexander King paternus
Alexandri King latoris presencium filij et heredis quondam alexandri King burgensis dicti burgi est
propinquior agnatus id est Consanguineus ex parte patris dicti Alexandri filij et excessit
vigintj quinque annorum et est sue rej prouidus et potens Canere ydonee de administracione
rej alane et non est immediate ipsi Alexandro si ipsum Alexandrum
decidere quia dictus Alexander habet vnam fratrem et sororem germanam de legittimo choro procreato datis
et clausis sub sigillo dicti ballivi et sigillis quorundam quj hinc inquisicionj intere
rant faciendum Anno die mense et loco prenotatis

Curia Balliuorum burgi de abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijo die mensis
Junij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo Nono

The saide day Johnne of buchane baxtar was maid quyt of tribulance of
Thomas moresone seruand' to Donald baxtar be ane suorne assis' Williame
Wormet forspekar

The said' day Agens howisone witht Thomas leslie his forspekar taxit
five s' and ane penny ilk day apone Johnne Andirsone that he occupijs hir butht
fra this day furth

The said' day Robert Waus producit ane' Instrument vndir the Subscriptioun' and'
Signe of ser Johnne Stirueling notar publict' makin mensioun' that he was maid'
Curat and procuratour of Robert prat et cetera and the selis of gilbert menyeis prouest ande
Johnne of Ratre for the tyme was procurit with Instance to be appensit to the said'
Instrument quhilkis war nocht appensit the said Instrument the said day

The said' day Walter howisone was in ane' amerciament of the Court in
defalt of presens as he that was lauchfully warnit and nocht Comperit et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
secundo die mensis Junij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo nono

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to sandy moir
tile ansuer' to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne Raburne spous to
marioun' Kintor for the non ressaving of sex elnis of quhit clath
bocht fra hir and promittit to ressaue It and pay hir v s' for euiry Elne

The said day the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cummys to Sandy
makesone mylnar to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Androw gordone
for the wranguis' away havin of the corne and sukkin out of the
tovne to the Justice myllis quhilk pertenit to him takisman of the myllis
of the tovne'

The said day William Wormet was conuikit be ane suorne assis'
Johnne of cullan forspekar for licht strublance of georg andirson'
for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court and tile Amend as law
will and forber in tyme tocum And the said georg quyt of ale strublance
of the said Wilyeame

The said day Wilyeame Wormet offerit him reddy tile vndirly
the ordinance of the Prouost bailyeis and Counsaile anent the amendis
of the strublance done to georg Andersoun'

The said it was sufficiently previt be thomas craufurd Johnne
andersone Androu barkar Duncan portar and James gourlay
that Johnne colisoun' sone to James colisone had pait ane petty quartar
of salt for the said James to Johnne buyt' And ane vthir petty quartar
of salt to puncioun' flemyng in the monetht of maij the yer of
god jM vC and aucht yeris

The said day Johnne brovne duelland' in Wallagask grantit him
content and pait of ale Somez' of money aucht tile him for his ry
and beir quhilkis he sauld' within this burgh'

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis assignit friday the xx day
of the monetht of Julij nixt tocum to ser thomas bynne on' that ane part
and Johnne andirson' on' that othir part to comper' befor thaim within the tolbutht athir
of thame bringand' sic richtis and euidencis as thai haue and wis wile
wse aganis vthiris tueching the matir debatable' betuix thame and the
annuell of x tua merkis persewit be the said ser thomas of the said Johnez'
land' in the gallougat anent the grayfreris as thai wil tyne and wyn'

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd'
forspekar that ale personis that resauit fremmit mennis gudis aucht to lay lad
nyng in thair schippis agane eftir the tenour of thair charteir party maid'
tharapone Correspondent to the gudis that thai resaue

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvto
die mensis Junij Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said' daye the borgh fudnin one Williame makesone be androwe
gordoun' was Continewit to friday

Inquisicio facta Apud Burgum de Abirdene vicesimo quinto die mensis Junij
Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo Coram honorabilibus viris Thoma leslie thoma
Waus et thoma Wode tribus ballivorum dicti burgj in pretorio eiusdem protribunali
sedenti per subscriptos videlicet Johannem ruthirfurd' militem Alexandrum malisone' mal
comum Crag Richardum Waus Dauid ruthirfurde Dauid fynn henricium reid'
Alexandrum Nory georgium Bisset Dauid arrot Andream litster Willelmum blinseile et
Andream Meldrum burgenses dictj burgj Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam
Johannes Catnes' auus Alexandri blinseile latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus
vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem dominj nostri regis de vno annuo redditu duodecim solidorum vsualis
monete scocie annuatim leuandum de fundo Cuiusdam terre heredum quondam Thome crab j cum pertinenciis
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem Inter terram vastam
quondam Robertj Club ex orientali ex vna et Aliam terram vastam quondam Alexandri howisone ex occidentali
partibus ab altera Et quod dictus Alexander est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Johannis auj suj
de dicto annuo redditu cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod valor dictj annuj redditus patet in se
Et quod tenetur in Capite de Supremo domino nostro rege Et quod nunc existit in manibus Supremj domini
nostri regis legittime per se ipsum per decessum quondam alisone lyel relicte quondam dictj Johannis
coniunctam infeodacionem huismodi annuj redditus habentis per spacium trium mensium aut eocirca In defec
tu veri heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis Datum et clausum sub sigillo
dictj balliuj et sigillis quorundam eorum quj hinc Inquisicionj Intererant
faciendum Sub Anno die mense et loco prenotatis et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviii die mensis Junij anno
Domini Millesimo quingentesimo ixo

The saide day the prouest bailyis Counsale and Communite presentit mastir Johne marschell
to the gramar' Scolis of the saide burghe' vacand' be deces' of vmquhile mastir
Williame Srathachin possessor of the samyn for ale the dais of his liwe and admittit
him to the saide scolis be gift of ane par of bedis with ale commoditeis fredomes and
profitis pertening tharto

The saide day gilbert menyeis prouest Robert crag Williame futhes Charllis stevinsone malcum
and Johne Crag Solemptlie protestit that thai be skathtles and fre gif ony happinnis to to
Cum one the frauchtismen and of peir' Waus' ande to haue recompens' of tham that has nocht laid'
in thar ladyn' et cetera Considering thai haue lad' in thar gudis in the said' peteris Schipe

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem tercio die
mensis Julij Anno et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day alexander pantone grantit that Johnne Colisone had set to him
ane hous' on' this condicioun' that he had takin the said hous fra him sua that he had
tane his arle penny And the said Johnne allegeit and said that his word was gud
eneucht for the set of the said hous

The said day it was fundin deliuirit be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd'
forspekar that alexander pantone is takisman to Johnne Colisone for ane yer'
of ane Inland' pertenyng to him liand' in the gallougat

The said day Comperit Johnne paterson' wth mastir Johnne marscheale his forspekar
and producit ane chartir maid be agnes Walcar and marion' Walcar douchtiris and
ayris tile vmquhile henry Walcar maid to Jonet smyth quhilk chartir bur in It
self that thar suld' be thre fut of Entires' of the forsaid forland to the Inland of Androw straton'
and yard of the saide Johnne Protestand' solempnitlie that quhat Androw stratoun' did' in the biggin
of the said forland' suld' turne him to na preiudice anent the entires' of the
said thre fut to the Inland' and yard forsaide et cetera

The said day day Thome vmfray grantit him awand' to Canny eduardson'
the wif of Johnne Ramsay iiij li' v s' les' for certane ry meile bocht
fra hir And atour the bailyeis chartir the said thomas to cum one friday that
nixt cummys befor thame and preif his pament of the haile Sovm' of
of v li' iiij s' quhilk the said Canny allegeit avand' hir be the said
thomas

The said day the wif of thome gledstan oftymes callit and nocht comperit
warnit be the officiar at the Instance

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eisudem sexto die Julij
anno quosupra

The said day Thome vmfray baxter grantit him to pay to Canny eduard
soun' the wif of Johnne ramsay iij li' xv s' betuix this and the fest of Sanct
berthilmo nixt hereftir following

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Richard Waus forspekar
that alexander moir wobstar sal ressaue sex elnys of quhit clath fra marioun'
Kintor and pay hir five s' for euiry elne And gif the said alexander moir has ony
condicioun' that he will follou apoun' the said marioun' thai ordand' to follow
hir tharof

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem Nono die mensis
Julij Anno quo supra
The said day the bailyeis assignit the

The said' day Donald baxtair grantit that he Intrometit witht ane barrell of
flour persewit be Dauid ruthirfurd' and' tennt the flour out of It and' allegijt
he bocht viij barrel of flour fra Williame chesam and' It was ane of thame

add.foreign: deposiciones testium productum per Dauid ruthirfurd'

div.p:
The said day Johnne of Crag deponit be his aith that he saw Dauid
ruthirfurde mark ane last of flour witht the mark put one the barrel thair present
persewit be him
Alexander Nory deponit be his aitht that he saw Dauid ruthirfurd' mark the
said' barrel witht his propir mark .
Johann Malisone deponit be his aitht that he saw Dauid ruthirfrd' mark
ane last of flour witht the said' mark

The said' day Mastir Johnne lindesay forspekar for Dauid ruthirfurde
askit Donald baxtar half ane last of flour as he that Intrometit with
ane' barrel of flour markit witht his mark and' tennt It be his awin'
toung grant And' the said' Donald allegijt he bocht the said flour fra
Williame chesame and' askit him to warrand' him the samyn

The said' day Williame chesam' grantit that he haid sauld' viij barrel
of flour to Donald' baxtair and' the barrel persewit be Dauid ruthirfurd'
Was markit witht the said' Williamis merk witht Calk And' the said' Do
nalde requirit the said' Williame to warrand' him the said' flour And'
the bailyeis assignet this day xv dais to the said Donald' to ansuer
to the said' Dauid for the said' half last of flour tharof ane' previt
be the said Dauidis propir mark And' assignet the samyn day to the
said' Willam to bring his warrand' anent the said' flour or soner
give Johnne fichat ande Johnne reid' cumis within the said' burgh

The said' day Johnne malisone grantit that he haide Johnne reid'
haid sellit to Williame chesame and' Johnne fechat ane last of flour
and' hecht to lay thame fre on' burd' bot he saw thame nocht

The said' day Dauid ruthirfurd' grantit that he haid na thing to say
to Johnne malisone anent ane' barrel of flour the quhilk he clamit befor
pertenande to the said' Johnne ande denyit that It was his .

The said' day William skene grantit him awand' to ellene of fif
tene s' and' vj d' quhilk the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of lawe

The said' day Canne hay was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Androw stratoun'
forspekar for the licht tribulance of marioune ruthirfurd' tile amend' as
law wile and' forbeir in tyme to cum quhilk was gevin for dome

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vndecimo
die mensis Julij Anno quosupra

The said day Johnne arthour Comperit In Jugment befor thomas Waus
and Duncan colisone twa of the bailyeis of the said' burgh' and confessit and
granti and obligacioun' maid be him and gilbert menyeis prouost to Johne'
antheir franchman induellar in Deip of the Sowme of sex scoir crovnis
vs' vj d' vsuale money of Scotland' for certane salt bocht and ressauit
be the said Johnne fra the said Johnne antheir francheman Quhilk
Johnne antheir allegeit ane part of the said Sovme contenit in the said
obligacioun' awand' to him and the dais of pament bipast tharfor he
protestit solempnitlie quhat costis skathis and expensis that he sustenit throw
the non pament of the said sovm' awing to him that he mycht Recouir the samyn
apon' the said Johnne arthour to giddir with the principale Sovm'

The said day Johnne arthour protestit solempnitlie that quhat costis skathis
dampnis and expensis suld' cum one him throw the non pament of the rest
of the Sowme awing to Johnne antheir franchman be his obligacioun'
suld' turne him to na preiudice bot suld' cum on' the perosnis that had ressauit
the salt that he had bocht fra the said francheman

The said day the Bailyeis assignit friday cum xv dais to thomas
Wod bailye to ansuer' to the borgh' fundin one him be Issobell Rait the relict'
of vmquhile Wilyeame Kymdy constable of Aberdene for the wranguis'
intrometting with the thridpart of ane half nethis fischeing of the Rait
And' atour the said bailyeis ordanit that the fischeingis of the said thridpart
be kepit vnto the tyme It be decidit gif the said Issobell has richt
tharto

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo tercio
die mensis Julij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono .

The said daye It was statut and' ordanit be the bailyeis and' Counsel present for
the tyme that na tugg nethis be put in the vatir of Dee befor lammes And'
gif ony be fundin thai salbe escheit And' the inputtaris salbe in ane amerciament
of the Court et cetera

The said' day the actioun' debatabil betuis Androu nauchty and Rob of mur
ray was continewit quhil eftir none to be decidit be bailyeis witht
consent of baitht the parteis

The said' day the bailyeis assignet this day viij dais to Alexander mathou
sone to ansuer to the borgh fundin one him be Walteir houysone'
for the wranguis halding fra him of xxij s' for the mail of ane
barne quhilk he haid In tak of the said' Walter et cetera
